title: Though I Have the Unique Skill 『Save & Load』, I Will Be Expelled From the Hero Party No Matter How Many Times I Start Over, Rather Fight Back- I Deal With My Ill Fate and Mess up the Hero - Novel Updates
tags: Beastkin   Betrayal   Determined Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Oneshot   Possessive Characters   Revenge   Royalty   Time Manipulation
author: Ryuta Kijima   木嶋隆太
description: 'I'm going to banish you from my party!' 。 Broad, declared by the Hero, returned to a month earlier using the skill Save & Load. In a month , Broad will be told he's expelled from the party . However, no matter how many times he repeats it, the 'Hero' banishes Broad. Broad who understands that it is not avoidable no matter what he does, searches for a different path of life rather than accept expulsion. To rise from an ill fate.>
